tool_description: Manages shopping cart items including viewing, updating quantities, removing items, and calculating totals with tax and shipping.

action.description: Action to perform: view, update_quantity, remove, clear, calculate_total

item_id.description: Item ID for update_quantity or remove actions

include_tax.description: Whether to include tax in total calculation

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [view, update_quantity, remove, clear, calculate_total].
Missing item ID: item_id is required for update_quantity and remove actions.
Invalid quantity: new_quantity must be a positive integer for update_quantity action.
Item not in cart: The specified item is not found in the user's cart.
Invalid promo code: The promotional code is expired or invalid.
Cart is empty: No items found in the cart to perform the requested action.
usage: Specify user_id and action. For item-specific actions, provide item_id and relevant parameters. For total calculation, optionally include tax settings and shipping information.

cart_items.description: Array of item IDs currently in the cart

item_quantities.description: Array of quantities for each cart item

subtotal.description: Cart subtotal before tax and shipping

total_with_tax.description: Total amount including tax and discounts

cart_status.description: Current status of the cart (active, empty, requires_update)
